questions.question: Do you prefer a male or female character?

answers.male-prioritize: I strongly prefer a male character.
answers.male-prefer: I prefer a male character, but it's not essential.
answers.female-prioritize: I strongly prefer a female character.
answers.female-prefer: I prefer a female character, but it's not essential.
answers.neutral: I don't lean either way. Recommend me a character without considering this.

questions.question: Do you want DLC characters, including crossovers, recommended to you?

answers.neutral: Absolutely, I am willing to buy DLC if the character fits my playstyle.
answers.base-prefer: I'm ok with it, but please prioritize non-DLC characters.
answers.base-priroritize: Please recommend me characters in the base game. I don't want to buy DLC.

questions.question: During a round, what would be your primary goal/something you enjoy most?

answers.combo-prioritize: Landing flashy, high damage combos to take the lead.
answers.movement-prioritize: Dashing in and out of range as I chip my opponent down.
answers.aggression-prioritize: Getting close and personal with my opponent through aggression.
answers.defense-prioritize: Waiting for my opponent to make mistakes that I can capitalize on.
answers.versatile-prioritize: I enjoy everything, please choose a versatile character for me.

questions.question: What would be your secondary goal/something you enjoy next? (Choose the same thing to double down)

answers.combo-prefer: Landing flashy, high damage combos to take the lead.
answers.movement-prefer: Dashing in and out of range as I chip my opponent down.
answers.aggression-prefer: Getting close and personal with my opponent through aggression.
answers.defense-prefer: Waiting for my opponent to make mistakes that I can capitalize on.
answers.versatile-prefer: I enjoy everything, please choose a versatile character for me.

questions.question: What would be your favorite offensive method?

answers.whiff-punish-prioritize: Striking the moment the opponent overextends and whiffs a move.
answers.counterhit-prioritize: A devastating counterhit when my opponent tries to attack.
answers.mixup-prioritize: Aggressive mixups that will keep them guessing.
answers.grab-prioritize: Grappling and throwing is the way to go - you can't break them all.
answers.plus-frame-prioritize: Mindgames from plus frames that will suffocate the opponent to death.
answers.poke-prioritize: Poking down the opponent down with a series of low risk moves.
answers.versatile-prioritize: So many options, I would like a character that can specialize in everything.

questions.question: What would be your next preferred offensive method? (Choose the same thing to double down)

answers.whiff-punish-prefer: Striking the moment the opponent overextends and whiffs a move.
answers.counterhit-prefer: A devastating counterhit when my opponent tries to attack.
answers.mixup-prefer: Aggressive mixups that will keep them guessing.
answers.grab-prefer: Grappling and throwing is the way to go - you can't break them all.
answers.plus-frame-prefer: Mindgames from plus frames that will suffocate the opponent to death.
answers.poke-prefer: Poking down the opponent down with a series of low risk moves.
answers.versatile-prefer: So many options, I would like a character that can specialize in everything.

questions.question: The opponent is on the ground - what do you want to do? (Okizeme)

answers.aggressive-prefer: I aggressively dash in, looking for a followup mixup.
answers.defensive-prefer: I take it safe and reset to neutral in a favorable position.
answers.versatile-prefer: I would like a character that has options for both.
answers.neutral: I don't have an opinion. Please don't take okizeme situations into consideration.

questions.question: Would you want to play a character focused around setups/pattern play?

answers.setups-prioritize: Absolutely! Please try to recommend me a character that focuses on setups.
answers.setups-prefer: I prefer setups, but it doesn't take priority over other options.
answers.setups-hate: I hate setups! Please try to recommend me characters that don't have setups as their focus.
answers.setups-unimpoortant: I prefer no setups, but I am willing to play a setup oriented character.
answers.neutral: I don't really have an opinion. Please don't take setups into consideration.

questions.question: Would you want to play a character with lots of stances?

answers.stance-heavy-prioritize: Stances are great, please try to recommend me a stance heavy character.
answers.stance-heavy-prefer: I prefer having stances, but it doesn't take priority over other options.
answers.stance-heavy-hate: I hate stance. Please try to recommend me characters that aren't stance heavy.
answers.stance-heavy-unimportant: I prefer having no stances, but I am willing to play a character with stances.
answers.neutral: I don't really have an opinion. Please don't take stances into consideration.

questions.question: Do you value your characters' built in movement? (backdash/sidestep)

answers.movement-prioritize: Yes, I think movement is very important
answers.movement-prefer: To an extent, characters with bad movement are frustrating to play.
answers.neutral: It's not something I feel strongly about, please don't take movement into consideration.

questions.question: Would you prefer a character with built in evasion in their moveset?

answers.evasion-prioritize: Yes, please prioritize a character with high evasion
answers.evasion-prefer: I would enjoy high evasion, but it's not a priority for me.
answers.neutral: I don't really have an opinion. Please don't take built-in evasion into consideration.

questions.question:
Recommend me characters that are: 
(Tiers are subjective, all characters are playable.)

answers.tier-1-prioritize: High tier only (regular TWT Ro 8 appearances, OP characters).
answers.tier-2-3-prioritize: Mid tier only(good characters with some flaws).
answers.tier-4-5-prioritize: Low tier only(characters with noticeable flaws).
answers.neutral: I don't care about tiers, please don't take it into consideration.

questions.question:
One last thing, do you have preference on character difficulty?
(Difficulty is subjective, all characters are hard at first.)

answers.gameplan-level-1-2-prioritize: I prefer characters that I can learn the basics with.
answers.gameplan-level-3-4-prioritize: I prefer characters that have challenging execution and gameplan.
answers.neutral: I don't have a preference on character difficulty.
answers.beginner-friendly-prioritize: Choose a "beginner friendly"character for me. I understand this is subjective.
